field.SQLQuery: select DISTINCT id,file from conf_file ORDER BY id
field.Label: Config id (int):

field.SQLQuery: select id, CONCAT(ip, ' v',CAST(build_ver AS CHAR)) AS 'IPO' from ipo ORDER BY id
field.Label: IPO id (int):
Select date
field.SQLQuery: SELECT DISTINCT datetime_started FROM results ORDER BY datetime_started

field.Label: Select date Start
field.SQLQuery: SELECT DISTINCT datetime_started FROM results ORDER BY datetime_started

field.Label: Select date End
field.SQLQuery: SELECT DISTINCT datetime_started FROM results ORDER BY datetime_started

field.Label: Select test status
field.SQLQuery: SELECT DISTINCT status FROM results ORDER BY status

field.Label: Select suite
field.SQLQuery: SELECT DISTINCT suite_name FROM `suite` ORDER BY suite_name

report.SQLQuery: SELECT suite_name, test_name, res_value, test_starttime, test_duration FROM results, suite WHERE results.suite_id = suite.suite_id ORDER BY test_id

SELECT suite_name, start_time, duration, description, conf_file.file, ipo.ip, ipo.build_ver, log.file FROM suite, conf_file, ipo, log WHERE suite_name = '@Suite@' AND suite.conf_id = conf_file.id AND suite.ipo_id = ipo.id AND log_id = log.id
